dai.gomoku.game.core

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • dai.gomoku.game.core.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create Board objects that are composed of Cell objects. I also think this is a good place to initialise the various CellChangeObserver objects that need to keep tabs on changes in the cells.
    Author:
    Muriithi Frederick Muriuki
